# `load_cosmx_folder_aggregate`

Load CosMx folder aggregate info


## Description

Load CosMx folder aggregate info


## Usage

```r
load_cosmx_folder_aggregate(dir_items, cores, verbose = TRUE)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`cores`     |     how many cores or threads to use to read data if paths are provided
`verbose`     |     be verbose when building Giotto object
